posts.post_content:
I have a T215 type 1 Latham PSA 1 for sale for SOLD shipped.  A picture of it is in my album here [url]http://www.net54baseball.com/album.php?albumid=63[/url]

If that does not work just click on my name and go to albums.


This was part of the group that was talked about in this thread:
[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=91797&highlight=soak+red+cross&page=2[/url]

If you soak it, it could look a lot better, albeit still damaged.

Hey Daniel,

I'll take it.  Email sent.

-Anthony
